title: 2/2 UNIT IN A  AMAZING APARTMENT BUILDING, TAKE THIS OPPORTUNITY!
posting_body: ["This building located in a rental community features a living room, dining room, tile floors, walk-in closets, window coverings, up to 10' ceilings, oversized windows with high impact glass, and a fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances.", 'Enjoy the comforts of central A/C, laundry in-unit, and off street parking.', 'The community offers resident lounge with pool table, direct access to Olivia Ristorante and Publix, elevated resort pool with panoramic view and sundeck, located close to seven golf courses, minutes from Hollywood beach boardwalk, private social network, yoga/flex studio with wellbeats, rooftop lounge, cabana, grilling area, fitness center, package service, controlled access, maintenance on site, property manager on site, concierge, 24 hour availability, online services, elevators, wheelchair accessible rooms, planned social activities.', 'Deleaded and pet friendly.', 'Close to shopping, dining, and entertainment.', 'Six minute drive to the I-95.', 'PHOTOS ARE AN EXAMPLE OF SIMILAR UNITS WITHIN THE BUILDING.', 'ACTUAL UNIT MAY VARY.', '***Availability and pricing is real-time and can change daily and vary by lease term*', 'Cats, Small Dogs (Under 25 lbs), Large Dogs (Over 25 lbs)', 'Pet Specifications:', 'Pets are welcome.', 'Pet fee: $500', 'Weight limit: 45 LB', '***', 'Text Message DALIT', 'to', 'show contact info', 'For Details & Pics Of This Property***', 'Brought to you by Dalit Rosenfeld at La Rosa Realty, Greater Fort Lauderdale.', 'REQUIREMENTS: 650+ credit score, income must be at least 2x rent, no prior evictions, clean background.', 'Should be able to provide current proof of income.', 'Move-in cost: 1st month rent due upon offer acceptance to secure unit for you off market, Last Month rent, and Security deposit due at move-in.', '****', 'show contact info', '***', 'For more Properties Click the LINK BELOW!', '<URL>']
